start.text: I have plan for you: more pain!

retreat.text: Daagh, too many little men on this team!

engaged.text: What's that? Kill them all? Good idea!
I am amused by entire itty-bitty-teeny fleet!
I am going to kill you, and kill you, and kill you!
I will squash you like bug!
You are no match for me!

out_of_missiles.text: Uh, oh. Do I not have any missiles?

pursuing.text: Is good time to run, cowards!
Run coward! I will find you!

hull_90.text: Let us fight; man versus tiny baby man.

hull_50.text: Who sent all these babies to fight?!
I will kill you with bare hands!

victory.text: I've yet to meet one that can outsmart bullet.

victory_boss.text: Who dares stand against me NOW?
